parameter.value: Be greeted, |PLAYERNAME|! You made it into our stronghold, impressive!
I am Tiria, Queen of the Amazons in this region. I protect our home, our people, and our way of life.
Amazons have called this region their home for years. Our founding mothers built this fortress in the forest many years ago. Intruders are not welcome.
The entrance to the fortress is very well-hidden, most enemies never find their way in.
